Articles.Content: Does anyone know what good size I could make for a duna rover and still keep it small enough I could fit under a lander? Also I want it to be crewed. Any tips?
it depends on the size of the lander. you can literally do anything there.  if you want a small rover, you should use the external seat and you could get away with 500 kg.
You could bring parts and assemble them using the engineering system.
